short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily remove image backgrounds from any website with just two clicks!🚀

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instant Background Remover is a powerful Browser extension that allows users to effortlessly strip away the backgrounds of images found on the internet. 

With a simple right-click, users can transform any image into a transparent masterpiece. Behind the scenes, the extension leverages the robust capabilities of the Metaverse Professional background removal API, ensuring precision and quality. 

Whether you're a designer, content creator, or just someone looking to play around with images, this tool is a game-changer. 🎨✨

7 day free trial 👍
